message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with text segmentation in natural scenes, which is a problem commonly addressed in computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method involves the use of a feature space and a discriminative classifier, which are also common techniques in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also introduces a novel stopping rule based on perceptual organization, which could be relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research.
